tweets.text: More destruction of nature?@EnvAgency Birds are breeding at the Lower Otter Restoration Project! #HS2 They are supposed to be protected! @GreenJennyJones @CarolineLucas @ZacGoldsmith https://t.co/LrFVhWMohv

Vegetation clearance starts from tomorrow. A very short visit this am incl: nest building Whitethroat, territorial Cetti's/Reed Warbler & Reed Bunting. Video shows how farcical this is! Still time to see sense @EnvAgency @kiergroup @Natures_Voice @Bucktonbirder  PLEASE RETWEET https://t.co/Tve0B6o4va

tweets.text:
@DefraGovUK @MPGeorgeEustice I don't understand, bear with me I've only had 6 hours sleep since Friday due to the toxic stench, what gives @RedIndustries2 the right to pollute my air with H2S & what gives @ClareDinnisEA  & @EnvAgencySE the right to ignore us?

@StinkStopthe https://t.co/GN1kRvy0uw

Breaking News . @EnvAgency have sanctioned the destruction of breeding birds tomorrow at the Lower Otter Restoration Project . This is #HS2 part 2 . PLEASE THINK AGAIN @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest Please follow @WiseBirding and RT https://t.co/I8Wv40YKqy

@ChrisGPackham @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest @WiseBirding Would you like to explain to your 461k followers, what an otter project in Devon has to do with HS2? The two are at nearly 200 miles apart and not event connected.  Complete misuse of social media.

I don't usually do this sort of thing, but when it is on my local patch it really gets to me!! Scrub & tree removal in May is terrible practice. Please retweet. https://t.co/cYEIymHH0K Two videos showing the area & my concerns. @DevonWildlife @Natures_Voice @EnvAgency @kiergroup https://t.co/U8doUyBP5K

Please listen now @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @NESouthWest @kiergroup This COULD be a fantastic project but you need to do the work at the correct time of year and NOT during the breeding season. Thanks @ChrisGPackham for the support and fingers crossed they see sense. https://t.co/En5Y1I6Rts

Benches, bike racks and habitat created near St Andrews Wetland to manage #flood risk and increase biodiversity @EnvAgencySW @kiergroup @MottMacDonald @SBFL_CN @AECOMEnvWater @CornwallCouncil @WestcountryRT @UniofExeterESI @SouthWestWater @CwllCFloodForum 
https://t.co/q7TorhflkG https://t.co/z6HICR1fsc

@SianieRoo @NewsNBC @EnvAgency @Cap_it_off @DefraGovUK @StinkStopthe @MPGeorgeEustice @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA Yes I agree. The process toward this is well underway here and is for the council’s professional officers to pursue free from political interference they might harm their case. As for the EA, I will along with @AaronBell4NUL be ensuring they are held to account for their failures

@WiseBirding @abibunker @EnvAgency @kiergroup @Natures_Voice @Bucktonbirder Chris you’re absolutely right. It’s just not acceptable. Have you reported it to the police - all this is a criminal offence and you have evidence of nesting surely?
@scottdegg @StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 So bad that the @EnvAgencyMids complaint mailbox was down over the weekend - hope there was nothing more to it?

tweets.text: @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @BorisJohnson @MattHancock @MPGeorgeEustice  Why is a lethal gas being allowed to seep into our homes? Why are we being ignored? The sound of silence! #StopTheStink https://t.co/KWF5fRPWy7

No update from @EnvAgencyMids after capping deadline @RedIndustries2 Walleys Landfill?The stink has been horrendous over the weekend,EA  email complaint mailbox not functioning,the odour’s not been mitigated,it’s still out of control-failure on failure @StinkStopthe #stopthestink

https://t.co/dc0T5LsDJv update from @EnvAgency when capping is either unfinished or failed. 
https://t.co/JYYb64Y2UV of the worse weeks ever. 
3.EA complaints email STILL not working. 
Something stinks worse than the landfill @DefraGovUK @MPGeorgeEustice Step in #stopthestink https://t.co/nP1rnSCe6b
@ChrisGPackham @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest @WiseBirding Chris -thank you for all that you do. A true wildlife hero 🥰❤️Wishing you a very happy 60th birthday. X

@SianieRoo @DefraGovUK @MPGeorgeEustice @EnvAgency @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe It’s not on anymore @PHE_uk say symptoms are short term to wake every morning with headache sore throat dry itchy eyes rubbish on my chest it’s daily exposure I feel ill every morning most evenings there slowly killing us #StopTheStink #CapItOf #AirPollution

How long will you allow people to be poisoned in their own homes @DefraGovUK @MPGeorgeEustice 
The @EnvAgency are failing us, we are horrified at their stalling tactics maximising the profits of big industry whilst ordinary folks suffocate in their beds @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe https://t.co/kUc53J5Fuv

@johnvarley @ChrisGPackham @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest @WiseBirding Got it. I was going off the info on the EA website and your https://t.co/NMOf2Cxf2h bio! Apologies for getting it wrong.

Hopefully everyone sees sense and follows the existing laws around habitat destruction in breeding season, before getting the undoubtedly good work started.

@JessinRuislip @ChrisGPackham @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest @WiseBirding https://t.co/aSSeEmHh2l   An electricity cable from France forms part of it..I believe the EU funding  has the deadline. This is about the 4th attempt at the project ..tried at 3 other locations but the landowners wouldn’t allow it..

@joetclarke @ChrisGPackham @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest @WiseBirding I am not an EA board member now.   I have not been involved in the project governance, planning, application or scheduling of any works.  Simply to avoid any perceived conflict.  I admit though I am passionate about delivering better space for nature and climate adaptation.

Please get this moving @SimonTagg @NewsNBC Everything needs to be thrown at this - the @EnvAgency are failing us. We need to protect our loved ones @Cap_it_off @DefraGovUK @StinkStopthe @MPGeorgeEustice @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA #stopthestink https://t.co/xuJCXwJ1jc
